product.description: The Rumor is true; the ultimate women’s full-suspension trail bike has arrived. From flowing singletrack trails to technical terrain, the Rumor is designed and engineered to give active-lifestyle riders the best-fitting and most-capable bike in the sport. With 110mm of FSR suspension, AUTOSAG tuning, Command Post dropper seatpost, and dialled geometry, the Rumor puts riders in complete control of their summertime mountain adventures.

bullets.bullet: All-new M5 manipulated alloy, 110mm-travel frame with Women's XC Trail 29er Geometry and tubesets, tapered headtube, sealed cartridge bearing pivots, and DMD derailleur mount makes this one tough and lightweight trail machine
FOX Float CTD Evolution shock with AUTOSAG with custom tune features 3 compression settings: Climb, Trail and Descend, plus ProPedal
FOX Float CTD Performance Series 29 fork with CTD damper, custom tune, rebound and compression adjust, lockout, tapered steerer tube and 110mm of travel smooths technical terrain
Roval Control Trail 29 142+ wheelset with butted DT Swiss spokes and a wider rim profile and 12mm thru-axle for lightweight toughness
Custom Formula T1 S hydraulic disc brakes with reach adjustment, metallic pads and SRAM compatible MiXmaster shifter mounts provide dependable braking
Proven SRAM drivetrain features X0 Type 2, 10-speed mid-cage rear derailleur for crisp and reliable gear changes

specs.frame: FRAME Specialized Rumor M5 hydroformed alloy frame, Women's XC Trail 29er Geometry and tubesets, tapered headtube, Command Post routing, DMD mounts, SRAM FD adapter, 110mm travel

specs.fork: FORK FOX Float Performance 29, CTD damper, tapered steerer, custom tune, lockout, rebound adj., standard QR dropouts, 110mm travel

specs.rear_brake: REAR BRAKE Custom Formula T1 S, metallic pad, 160mm rotor

specs.front_derailleur: FRONT DERAILLEUR SRAM X7, 10-speed, S3 direct mount for DMD, bottom-pull
specs.rear_derailleur: REAR DERAILLEUR SRAM X0 Type 2, 10-speed, mid cage

specs.crankset: CRANKSET Custom SRAM carbon S-2200, 10-speed Trail double, PF30 spindle, S: 165mm, M: 170mm, L: 175mm
specs.bottom_bracket: BOTTOM BRACKET SRAM PF30, OS press-in bearings, sealed cartridge
specs.pedals: PEDALS Resin test ride w/ toe clips, CEN std.

specs.front_hub: FRONT HUB Roval Control 29, OS28 end caps, QR, 32h
specs.rear_hub: REAR HUB Roval Control 29 142+, DT Swiss alloy cassette body, 12mm thru-axle, 32h

specs.rear_tire: REAR TYRE Specialized Ground Control, 2Bliss Ready, 29x2.1", aramid bead, 60TPI
specs.saddle: SADDLE Specialized Body Geometry Jett Comp Gel, hollow Cr-Mo rails, 143mm

product.description: The Rumor is true; the ultimate women’s full-suspension trail bike has arrived. From flowing singletrack trails to technical terrain, the Rumor is designed and engineered to give active-lifestyle riders the best-fitting and most-capable bike in the sport. With 110mm of FSR suspension, AUTOSAG tuning, and dialled geometry, the Rumor puts riders in complete control of their summertime mountain adventures.

bullets.bullet: All-new M5 manipulated alloy, 110mm-travel frame with Women's XC Trail 29er Geometry and tubesets, tapered headtube, sealed cartridge bearing pivots, and DMD derailleur mount makes this one tough and lightweight trail machine
RockShox Monarch RL air shock with AUTOSAG and custom tune smooths the trail and is simple to set up
RockShox Reba RL 29 fork has 110mm of travel, new Solo Air spring, rebound and compression adjust, and a tapered steerer tube makes for lightweight and efficient trail suspension
Roval 29 rims mated to Specialized Hi Lo hubs, oversized endcaps, a 142+ rear hub spacing, and 12mm thru axle increase wheel stiffness for more confident riding

Custom SRAM S-1250 Trail double crankset with PF30 spindle and a custom alloy guard for chain retention during high-speed descents; the SRAM X9 Type 2, 10-speed mid-cage rear derailleur provides smooth and reliable shifts
Custom Avid Elixir 5 R SL with tool-less reach adjust, 160mm HS-1 rotors and alloy-backed organic pads for high-performance stopping power
Women's Body Geometry Jett Comp Gel saddle with hollow Cr-Mo rails features lightweight foam cushioning and an ergonomic cutout for pressure relief

product.description: The Rumor is true; the ultimate women’s full-suspension trail bike has arrived. From flowing singletrack trails to technical terrain, the Rumor is designed and engineered to give active-lifestyle riders the best-fitting and most-capable bike in the sport. With 110mm of FSR suspension and dialled geometry, the Rumor puts riders in complete control of their summertime mountain adventures.

bullets.bullet: All-new M5 manipulated alloy, 110mm-travel frame with Women's XC Trail 29er Geometry and tubesets, tapered headtube, sealed cartridge bearing pivots, and DMD derailleur mount makes this one tough and lightweight trail machine
X-Fusion RL air shock features a custom tune for a supple yet efficient ride. utilise the lockout for maximum efficiency on smooth surfaces
SR Suntour XCR 29 fork features women's spring weights for optimum traction and 110mm of trail smoothing suspension. Lockout comes in handy on long fire road climbs
Tektro Draco 2 hydraulic disc brakes with women's shorter reach levers and Light Wave rotors create increased control and superior stopping power for more confident descents
The 9-speed Shimano drivetrain features the Shadow rear derailleur for smooth shifting and has increased clearance from trail obstacles
Specialized Body Geometry Riva Comp Women's saddle features patented Body Geometry design for increased comfort
